title: A letter sent from Syrranam, to His Excellency, the Lord Willoughby of Parham, General of the Western Islands, and of the continent of Guianah, &c. then residing at the Barbados together, with the Lord Willoughby's answer thereunto : with a commendable description of that country / by Henry Adis.
author: Adis, Henry.
notes: By a sectarian who had settled in Guiana for the sake of the liberty of conscience promised by the English colonial officials.--cf. JCB Lib. cat., pre-1675, III, 105-106.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
